products.title: Aura Cork Yoga Mat
products.body_html: The Aura was created with comfort and sustainability in mind. Made from renewable materials, our most cushioned yoga mat provides added support for your joints. We developed a fine-grain cork surface for a soft feel, yet with no sacrifice on grip, which increases with moisture. Our signature plant foam bottom is optimized for stability and energy return. The Aura will completely change your perspective on how a yoga mat can be so light, yet durable and high-performing.

products.title: Unity Pro Cork Yoga Mat
products.body_html: Introducing the Unity Pro, our most durable and sustainable yoga mat to date. Crafted from 83% USDA-certified renewable materials, this mat is thoughtfully engineered to balance peak performance with superior comfort. Its unique cork and natural rubber blend creates an unmatched non-slip surface in wet or dry conditions, ensuring stability and confidence in every pose, making it the ideal choice for any style of practice.

products.title: Original Cork Yoga Mat
products.body_html: The Original reimagines how a yoga mat made from 51% renewable materials can be so high-performing for any practice. The world’s first cork yoga mat uses a premium layer of extra thick cork for a grounded, non-slip experience dry or wet with no need for a towel. Our signature Plant Foam bottom is optimized for cushion, stability, and energy return.

products.title: Nomad Cork Yoga Mat
products.body_html: Meet our extra light and ultra versatile yoga mat made with renewable materials. A premium layer of eco-friendly cork provides a non-slip and antimicrobial surface that is easy to care for and maintain. A luxuriously dense plant foam base, free of PVC’s and latex gives added comfort and support. If your practice takes you to the local studio, beach, a mindful hike or on your next big adventure the Nomad will be there for you.

products.title: Nomad Air Cork Yoga Mat
products.body_html: Meet the most portable cork yoga mat ever created. The Nomad Air is designed to fold or roll making it an extra compact mat that you can take with you anywhere you go.  Features a premium layer of eco-friendly cork on top for a non-slip surface that is easy to care for and maintain. A thin natural rubber bottom for unmatched durability that grips to any surface. If your practice takes you to the local studio, beach, a mindful hike or on your next big adventure the nomad air will be there for you.

featured_image.alt: Nomad Air Cork Yoga Mat - Yoloha Yoga
Nomad Air Cork Yoga Mat - Yoloha Yoga

products.title: Nomad XL Cork Yoga Mat
products.body_html: The Extra-Large Nomad measures 80″ x 48″, offering an expansive practice space ideal for home studios, gyms, and more. Its premium eco-friendly cork surface delivers a naturally non-slip layer that is both easy to clean and maintain. Beneath, a luxuriously dense plant foam base provides exceptional comfort and support. Weighing just 4.5 lbs, the Nomad XL is conveniently portable, making it as versatile as it is high-performing.

products.title: Kids Aura Cork Yoga Mat
products.body_html: Created with young yogis in mind. Natural cork surface makes cleaning and care easy, while providing a grippy and safe surface for little hands and feet. Thick, lightweight foam made from renewable materials provides extra padding for developing joints and growing bones. Non-Toxic and free from any latex, PVC’s and plasticizers.

products.title: Mountain Magic Unity Pro Cork Yoga Mat
products.body_html: Introducing the Unity Pro, our most durable and sustainable yoga mat to date. Crafted from 83% USDA-certified renewable materials, this mat is thoughtfully engineered to balance peak performance with superior comfort. Its unique cork and natural rubber blend creates an unmatched non-slip surface in wet or dry conditions, ensuring stability and confidence in every pose, making it the ideal choice for any style of practice.

products.title: Unity Pro XL Cork Yoga Mat
products.body_html: The extra-large Unity is the ultimate home studio mat. With double the width of a standard yoga mat, the Unity XL gives you extra space to move, stretch, and flow freely. A cork and natural rubber blended surface creates a more grounded and supportive feel, serious grip performance dry or wet, optimum durability, and low environmental impact. Whether you are doing a high-intensity workout or a gentle flow, we haven't found a type of practice this mat isn't good for. Handcrafted responsibly with 83% bio-certified materials.

products.title: Mountain Magic Unity Pro XL Cork Yoga Mat
products.body_html: The extra-large Unity is the ultimate home studio mat. With double the width of a standard yoga mat, the Unity XL gives you extra space to move, stretch, and flow freely. A cork and natural rubber blended surface creates a more grounded and supportive feel, serious grip performance dry or wet, optimum durability, and low environmental impact. Whether you are doing a high-intensity workout or a gentle flow, we haven't found a type of practice this mat isn't good for. Handcrafted responsibly with 83% bio-certified materials.
